name: hacktober_website_22
description: This website contains different issues. Contributor's job is to find the problems and raise issues regarding it. He/She can contribute to the website by fixing the issues. This can be done by forking the repository on your own remote repository, making the required changes in the project and creating pull requests to merge your changes in the original repository. All this will be showcased to you in the git session with the hands on experience where you can practically do it by operating and fixing issues of this website.
